channel.title: Already Fixed!
channel.description:
Hey So i just watched a video, with the same source i have, a blank one... So i did EXACTLY like he did, and he had a shop... I had an exception... I added the client.java wanneshop crap, and the autospawn, and the shop.cfg heres my code for shop.cfg
//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item---- shop = 1 Custom_Shop 2 2 8010 1 8002 1 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
Here's my code for client.java
} else if (NPCID == 534) { //Fairy Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Custom_Shop
Heres the exception in the runserver, not the compiler... runserver...
Unlimited-pkz Is now online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 Custom_Shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)
Please help, it would be greatly appreciated if you help or do Teamviewer!

item.title: Already Fixed!
item.dc:creator: @JavaCoderV2 JavaCoderV2
item.description:
@JavaCoderV2 wrote:

Hey
So i just watched a video, with the same source i have, a blank one… So i did EXACTLY like he did, and he had a shop…
I had an exception…
I added the client.java wanneshop crap, and the autospawn, and the shop.cfg

heres my code for shop.cfg

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item---- shop = 1 Custom_Shop 2 2 8010 1 8002 1 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]

Here’s my code for client.java

} else if (NPCID == 534) { //Fairy Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Custom_Shop

Heres the exception in the runserver, not the compiler… runserver…

Unlimited-pkz Is now online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 Custom_Shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)
Please help, it would be greatly appreciated if you help or do Teamviewer!
